data.name: SpaGCN
data.description: SpaGCN: Integrating gene expression, spatial location and histology to identify spatial domains and spatially variable genes by graph convolutional network

evidence: "The SpaGCN package is an implementation of a garph convolutional network for spatial transcriptomics. With SpaGCN, you can: Preprocess spatial transcriptomics data... Build a graph convolutional network... identify spatially variable genes"
"Toy data and results can be downloaded at: https://drive.google.com/..." (indicates it is run as an analysis tool on data, i.e., an application)

"Souce code: [Github](https://github.com/jianhuupenn/SpaGCN)" and the README only describes cloning/tutorials from GitHub, with no mention of package managers or binaries, implying distribution via the source repository. The owner metadata shows a personal GitHub user account (jianhuupenn), indicating an individual maintainer.
